attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to request the prime minister to resign as an M.P with immediate effect in recognition that the people of great britain feel let down by his government, on many issue including the war in iraq, the mis-handling of the resession and how as chancellor of the exchequor he mis-sold our gold reserves at a massive loss

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
